title: A Phase 1/2 randomized, placebo-controlled, multi-centre study to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of COVID-19 Vaccine in Healthy Adults

Simplifying to 2 different vaccine dose arms (for the 2 different amounts of shots) and a placebo arm (this is basically what Phase 1 looked like) as we can't really easily differentiate shot + shot vs. shot + placebo (both at different doses) vs. just placebo well in our schema.

title: An Adaptive Study of Favipiravir Compared to Standard of Care in Hospitalized Patients With COVID-19

title: Assessment of the Effectiveness of Vibroacoustic Therapy for Respiratory Failure Caused by COVID 19

title: Safety and Efficacy of PHR 160 Spray on the Outcomes of Patients With COVID-19

title: Low-dose Tocilizumab Versus Standard of Care in Hospitalized Patients With COVID-19
comments: Contains two sub-studies. Basically Toc (at 2 doses) vs SoC and High-dose Toc vs 2 Low-doses of Toc. I'm representing this as 3 unique doses of Toc overall (40, 120, 400) and a soc arm.

title: Virucidal Effect of Povidone Iodine on COVID-19 In-Vivo
comments: Various concentrations (6 overall, 4 uniqu) and delivery methods of povidone iodine. For our purposes fine to collapse into 2 PI arms (for the 2 types of delivery as the main distinguishing factor) and then the placebo control.
